entries.alt: TV guide concept showing a streamlined hero banner and content rows
entries.caption: North-star hero layout that blends promotional space with quick entry points.

entries.alt: Navigation concept highlighting simplified top-level filters
entries.caption: Unified navigation language creates parity across Sling and DISH surfaces.

entries.alt: Channel grid wireframe illustrating tuned information density
entries.caption: Rebalanced grid hierarchy elevates critical metadata while preserving familiarity.

entries.alt: Prototype showcasing a contextual program details drawer
entries.caption: Contextual drawers unlock deeper detail without forcing a full view change.

entries.alt: Comparison of legacy and proposed personalization tiles
entries.caption: Personalized tiles ladder to recommendations proven to reduce bounce.

entries.alt: Mobile guide exploration emphasizing quick filters
entries.caption: Mobile-first explorations reinforce parity with the living-room experience.
Transition guidelines preserve context when users pivot between guide states.

entries.alt: Accessibility adjustments highlighting typography and contrast
entries.caption: Accessibility calibrations improve legibility without sacrificing density.

entries.alt: Profile personalization concepts with curated rows
entries.caption: Profile-aware curations deliver relevant rows tuned to household preferences.

entries.alt: Scenario map detailing the future-state experience
entries.caption: Scenario mapping ties the experience vision to measurable business outcomes.

entries.alt: Research mural capturing discovery insights and opportunity areas
entries.caption: Discovery synthesis highlighted moments where the guide failed to build trust.

entries.alt: Persona spread summarizing Sling and DISH household archetypes
entries.caption: Personas grounded prioritization in the shared needs of core audiences.

entries.alt: Service blueprint detailing current versus future guide operations
entries.caption: Blueprinting exposed operational friction that shaped the rollout plan.

entries.alt: Journey map showing uplift after guide refinements
entries.caption: Experience journey visualized the uplift realized after staging the rollout.

entries.alt: Dashboard of KPI improvements tied to the guide initiative
entries.caption: KPI dashboard quantified value capture across revenue and retention levers.
Roadmap visualization aligned teams on sequencing and readiness gates.
